    • Method Detail

      • getfirstBatch

        public Batch getfirstBatch(int projectID)
                    throws DatabaseException
        This method will access the Batches table and get the first batch that corresponds to the selected project ID
        Parameters:
        projectID - the project id of the target batch
        Returns:
        the first batch that corresponds to the selected project ID
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if the operation fails for any reason

      • getfirstAvailableBatch

        public Batch getfirstAvailableBatch(int projectID)
                             throws DatabaseException
        This method will access the Batches table and get the first available batch that corresponds to the selected project ID
        Parameters:
        projectID - the project id of the target batch
        Returns:
        the first available batch that corresponds to the selected project ID
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if the operation fails for any reason

      • add

        public void add(Batch batch)
         throws DatabaseException
        This method will add a Batch to the Batches table in the data base
        Parameters:
        batch - the batch to be added to the data base
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if the operation fails for any reason
